mainTitle_1: Get rid of old appliances in Grodno — enjoy freedom and order in your home!
mainTitle_2: Dispose of unwanted appliances in Grodno and make the world a better place with minimal effort!
mainTitle_3: Eco-friendly disposal in Grodno — good for the planet and your peace of mind!
mainTitle_4: Buying and removing old household appliances in Grodno
advantagesDesc: When you hand over your appliances to us, you get not only comfort and security but also contribute to environmental protection. Our key advantages:
advantageDesc_1: — we collect your appliances directly from your home or office at a time convenient for you.
advantageDesc_2: — we recycle old appliances with minimal environmental impact.
advantageDesc_3: — we offer the best conditions and a fair assessment of your appliances for disposal.
advantageDesc_4: — we pay you a reward for every kilogram of appliances you recycle.
advantageDesc_5: — submitting a request takes just a few minutes, and we pick up the appliances as quickly as possible.
advantageDesc_6: — we adapt to your schedule and collect your appliances when it suits you best — even on weekends.
processDescMore: We've designed a straightforward and convenient appliance disposal process:
processDesc_1: Submit a request on our website or call us. We will coordinate a convenient pickup time with you.
processDesc_2: Our courier will arrive at the agreed time and collect your appliances free of charge.
processDesc_3: You receive a reward for every kilogram of appliances disposed of, calculated according to pre-set rates.
processDesc_4: Every stage of disposal is controlled to ensure that appliances do not harm the environment and are put to new use.
serviceTitle: What Appliances Do We Accept for Disposal?
serviceDesc: We accept various types of appliances
recyclingDesc: After we collect your appliances, they go through several recycling stages:
recyclingDesc_1: All devices are carefully disassembled to separate hazardous components (batteries, mercury-containing elements, etc.).
recyclingDesc_2: Materials are sorted by type (plastic, metal, glass, cables, etc.).
recyclingDesc_3: Most materials are sent for recycling and later used to manufacture new products.
recyclingDesc_4: Everything that cannot be recycled is disposed of according to environmental standards.

reviewsPage.title: Customer Reviews
reviewsPage.text_1: Excellent service! They arrived quickly and took all the appliances straight from my apartment. Very convenient!
reviewsPage.text_2: I never knew it was so easy to get rid of an old fridge. Highly recommend!
reviewsPage.text_3: We ordered office equipment removal for our company. Everything went smoothly and hassle-free. Thank you!
reviewsPage.text_4: Very polite staff. They did everything carefully and efficiently!
reviewsPage.text_5: Great job, got rid of my old TV without any hassle!
reviewsPage.text_6: Thank you for the quick service! Everything was taken out neatly, no mess left behind.
reviewsPage.text_7: They removed my old washing machine very promptly. I'm satisfied with the service!
reviewsPage.text_8: Fantastic service! Got rid of unwanted appliances in just 10 minutes. Thanks!
reviewsPage.text_9: Super convenient service! No need to find movers, they handled everything for me.
reviewsPage.text_10: Fast and professional removal of my old fridge. Highly recommend to everyone!

gotQuestion: Do you have questions about appliance recycling?
sendDesc: Please feel free to contact us using the form below. We will be happy to help you!
name: Name
subject: Subject
question_1: What types of appliances do you accept?
answer_1: We accept refrigerators, washing machines, TVs, computers, air conditioners, microwaves, and other appliances. If you have something unusual, contact us, and we’ll let you know if we can take it.
question_2: How can I request appliance removal?
answer_2: You can submit a request on our website, call us, or message us through messengers. We will arrange a time and come on a day convenient for you.
question_3: What condition should the appliances be in?
answer_3: We accept both working and non-working appliances. The main requirement is that they do not contain hazardous substances (e.g., leaking batteries).
question_4: Do I need to disassemble the appliances before handing them over?
answer_4: No, disassembly is not required. Our specialists will take care of it and prepare them for recycling.
question_5: Which regions do you operate in?
answer_5: We provide appliance removal services in Grodno.
question_6: Can I recycle multiple appliances at once?
answer_6: Yes, you can dispose of multiple appliances at the same time. If you have a large quantity, let us know in advance so we can arrange the appropriate transport and schedule a convenient pickup time.
wantFreeDesc: Order appliance removal through our website and get it for free!
aboutUsTitle: We are a company specializing in the collection and recycling of household appliances.
aboutDesc_1: Our mission is to help you safely and conveniently dispose of old or faulty appliances, ensuring their recycling in accordance with environmental standards.
aboutDesc_2: We work with both private customers and businesses, providing reliable and convenient recycling solutions. Whether you want to free up space in your apartment or office, we handle the entire process—from pickup to recycling.
aboutBenefitDesc_1: – We recycle appliances while minimizing environmental impact. All work is carried out in compliance with ecological norms and standards.
aboutBenefitDesc_2: – You don’t need to go anywhere or worry about where to dispose of your unwanted appliances. We come to you, pick them up, and organize their recycling.
aboutBenefitDesc_3: – We strictly adhere to all recycling and disposal regulations. Every collected appliance undergoes safe processing, ensuring no harm to the environment.
weCare: We care about your appliances and the planet
step1: You submit a request – via our website or by phone.
step2: We arrange a time – selecting a convenient day for you.
step3: Our specialists arrive – collect the appliances and transport them for recycling.
step4: Appliances are recycled – safely, following all norms and standards.
weCareDesc_1: We care not only about our customers’ convenience but also about the future of our planet.
weCareDesc_2: Together, we can make the world a cleaner place!
whatWeAccept: What Do We Accept for Recycling?
whatWeAcceptDesc: We accept a wide range of devices for safe and eco-friendly recycling. Your old appliances shouldn't harm the environment, and we ensure their proper disposal.
fridgesAndFreezersDesc: We guarantee eco-friendly disposal of old refrigerators and freezers, including the safe recycling of freon.
washersAndDryersDesc: Got a broken washing machine or dryer? We accept these appliances for recycling in compliance with all environmental regulations.
microwavesAndVacuumsDesc: We recycle old microwaves and vacuum cleaners with minimal environmental impact.
kitchenAppliancesDesc: We accept old kettles, heaters, blenders, coffee makers, and other small kitchen appliances.
heatersDesc: We recycle old heaters with minimal impact on nature.
electricKettlesDesc: We accept old electric kettles for recycling.
officeEquipmentDesc: We recycle old office equipment, including printers, scanners, and fax machines, with minimal environmental impact.
gamingConsolesDesc: We accept old gaming consoles for disposal in compliance with all environmental regulations.
camerasDesc: We recycle old cameras and camcorders, ensuring an environmentally safe recycling process.
audioEquipmentDesc: We recycle old audio equipment, including speakers, headphones, and amplifiers, while adhering to environmental standards.
laptopsAndComputersDesc: We accept old laptops, computers, and components for recycling with minimal environmental impact.
mobileDevicesDesc: We accept old mobile phones and tablets for eco-friendly disposal.
airConditionersDesc: We accept old air conditioners for environmentally safe disposal.
waterHeatersDesc: We recycle old water heaters in compliance with environmental regulations.
freezerChestsDesc: We accept old freezer chests and ensure their safe recycling.
fitnessEquipmentDesc: We recycle old fitness equipment with minimal environmental impact.
electricScootersDesc: We accept old electric scooters and bicycles for recycling.
securitySystemsDesc: We recycle old security equipment, including cameras and alarm systems.
personalCareDevicesDesc: We recycle old personal care devices, such as hair dryers and electric razors.
stovesDesc: We recycle old gas and electric stoves in compliance with all environmental regulations.

pp.this_privacy_policy: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the 'Policy') governs the collection, use, storage, and disclosure of information provided by users of web applications and services.
pp.committed_to_maintaining: EcoSborTech is committed to ensuring the confidentiality and protection of personal data in compliance with applicable laws, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), and other international standards.
pp.company_may_collect: We may collect the following types of data:
pp.provided_voluntarily: Personal data: Name, email address, phone number, and other data voluntarily provided by the user through forms.
pp.technical_data: Technical data: IP address, device type, browser data, operating system, and website behavior.
pp.cookie: Cookies: To enhance the user experience and analyze application performance.
pp.data_collected: Data is collected for the following purposes:
pp.improving_the_quality: Improving the quality of web applications and services.
pp.stores_personal: We store personal data only for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes of its processing and in accordance with the user's country's legislation. After achieving the purposes, the data is deleted or anonymized.
pp.does_not_transfer_data: The company does not transfer personal data to third parties, except in the following cases:
pp.engaging_service_providers: When engaging third-party service providers (e.g., hosting, analytics) who are obligated to maintain data confidentiality.
pp.data_transfer_countries: In case of data transfer to other countries, we ensure compliance with international privacy standards.
pp.depending_on_laws: Depending on the legislation of their country of residence, users may have the following rights:
pp.request_correction: Request correction or deletion of data.
pp.exercise_rights: To exercise their rights, users may contact us using the details provided on the website.
pp.company_takes_measures: We take technical and organizational measures to ensure data security, including:
pp.restricting_access: Restricting access to data to authorized employees only.
pp.company_reserves_right: We reserve the right to amend this Policy. Updates are published on the Company's official website. Users are encouraged to periodically check for changes.
pp.company_operates: We operate in accordance with international privacy standards and process data in compliance with the laws of the countries where users are located. For cross-border data transfers, mechanisms ensuring data protection, such as Standard Contractual Clauses, are used.
pp.have_any_questions: If you have any questions or inquiries related to this Policy, you can contact us using the details provided on the website.

thankYouMessageBooking.wait: Our manager will call you back within an hour.

lawAddress: Legal address of JSC "Brest-VTI" Brest, Svetlaya St. 1, 224020

home.title: Appliance Recycling and Pickup in Grodno — EcoSborTech
home.description: Recycle your unwanted appliances with ease — free home pickup, cash reward per kilogram, and eco-friendly processing. EcoSborTech in Grodno offers a convenient way to dispose of old electronics without harming the environment!

aboutUs.title: About EcoSborTech — Appliance Disposal with Care for the Environment
aboutUs.description: EcoSborTech is a trusted company specializing in the pickup and recycling of household appliances. We serve individuals and businesses with free collection, fair evaluation, and an environmentally responsible approach. Submit a request in just 1 minute — we’ll take care of the rest!

services.title: What We Recycle — Full List of Accepted Appliances at EcoSborTech
services.description: We recycle refrigerators, washing machines, laptops, air conditioners, phones, TVs, and more. EcoSborTech guarantees safe and eco-compliant recycling. Find out what you can hand over — quick, easy, and profitable!

contacts.title: Contact EcoSborTech — Get in Touch or Schedule a Pickup
contacts.description: Have questions? Contact EcoSborTech — we’ll explain how to recycle your appliances, accept your pickup request, and help with the evaluation. Fast response, friendly service, and we operate throughout Grodno and the region.
